description: This Java class 'FileAttachment' models file attachment references such as PDFs within an invoice management system. It uses JPA annotations for ORM mapping to the 'file_attachments' database table, including fields for file metadata and relationships to 'Invoice' and 'Partner'.

classes.name: FileAttachment
classes.description: Entity representing a file attachment related to invoices and partners, including metadata such as filename, URL, MIME type, size, and timestamps.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the file attachment.

methods.name: getFileName
methods.description: Returns the filename of the attachment.

methods.name: setFileName
methods.description: Sets the filename of the attachment.

methods.name: getFileUrl
methods.description: Returns the URL of the file.

methods.name: setFileUrl
methods.description: Sets the URL of the file.

methods.name: getMimeType
methods.description: Returns the MIME type of the file.

methods.name: setMimeType
methods.description: Sets the MIME type of the file.

methods.name: getSizeBytes
methods.description: Returns the size of the file in bytes.

methods.name: setSizeBytes
methods.description: Sets the size of the file in bytes.
